Description:
At Last Your Family Can Spread Out in Comfort
CLOSING DATE SALE Tuesday 28th January 5:30pm (Unless Sold Prior)
Your family can spread out and feel right at home in this spacious and modern 2-storey retreat. This 5 bedroom plus study home is set in a beautiful cul-de-sac, with own gate into Yarra Rd Primary. Lush landscaped gardens create a burst of colour from the street, while the freshly painted, light-filled interior is styled with hardwood polished floorboards.
Five bedrooms (robed) plus the option of a study/6th-BR will make life a breeze. A family bathroom and powder room complement these; the master has ensuite and WIR. Three separate living areas and a fully-equipped timber kitchen with a dishwasher will keep everyone happy. A lounge room, large rumpus/media room and vast family/meals room offer you wonderful versatility. The paved entertaining area with a vergola opening roof system, covered pergola and gorgeous landscaped garden set the scene for brilliant outdoor living.
Plus laundry with excellent storage and appointments: remote double garage (rear/undercover access), ducted heating, evaporative cooling, split system, fabulous storage and shed. Walk to Yarra Rd Primary, transport and Hochkins Ridge Reserve; close to Luther College, Good Shepherd Lutheran Primary, Yarra Valley Grammar, shops and EastLink. So family-friendly act now!
Insights: 8 MCKERRAL PLACE, CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136 was last sold in 2014 and 16 other 5 bedroom house in CROYDON NORTH have recently been sold.

Description:
HEART WARMING WEATHERBOARD
This classic weatherboard home offers so much potential, from three large bedrooms to the inviting separate dining area adjoining a kitchen boasting stainless steel appliances. Outside you are greeted with a compact garden and inviting outdoor deck perfect for entertaining. Within easy walking distance of local shops and transport.
With extras of ducted heating, split system cooling and close to Chirnside Park, local shops and all other amenities. Perfect for first home buyers, investors and anyone wanting to roll up their sleeves and do a bit of work they are sure to reap the rewards.
Sarah Whitworth - Croydon Office : 0425 405 514

Description:
Contemporary Clinker - 877m2
There's simply nothing left to do but move in and enjoy this classic clinker brick home.
With its stylishly updated interior, the elevated, split-level 3 bedroom retreat will delight Families, Investors and First Homebuyers. As well as the magnificent views from its elevated position, you'll also love the clever floor plan and highlight cathedral ceilings. Discover 3 privately zoned bedrooms, including a mezzanine style study nook and retreat, crisp family bathroom and 2nd toilet. Relax or entertain in style in the light-filled lounge beside the central open fire. You'll enjoy the practicality of an updated gourmet kitchen showcasing a full suite of
s/s Euro appliances. The family/meals room is also a 'feel-good' space; it opens to a paved patio and in-ground pool to entice outdoor living and summer entertaining.
The landscaped garden, ideal for children to play, offers privacy coupled with stunning views to the nearby hills. It's well appointed with ducted heating, air conditioning, polished floors, single carport with electric door, and off street parking. All in a premier location, close to quality schools, Warrien Reserve, transport and shops. Be quick - Inspection will Impress!
Naiomi Bentley : 0404 036 044

Description:
So Much to Offer!
If you're after a low-maintenance lifestyle or investment that effortlessly blends good looks with location, this BV home is for you. It's set in a premier street to suit Downsizers, Investors or First Homebuyers. Set at the front of a boutique block of 3, this 'feel-good' home is beautifully presented and ready for your enjoyment. Refreshed landscaped gardens create impact, while the light-splashed interior is enhanced by big windows, cathedral ceilings and garden views. The ease of a smart open plan kitchen/meals area fitted with updated appliances and excellent storage. Unwind in the comfort of the spacious and elegant lounge room which features fresh carpet and an open fire place. Featuring three good sized bedrooms, master with WIR and full ensuite while the other bedrooms are serviced by a central bathroom and separate toilet. Outdoors you'll be able to relax or enjoy barbeques in the privacy of the rejuvenated landscaped garden. Appointments: weather wall air-conditioner, gas ducted heating, off street parking and remote double garage. Close to transport, local shops, Hochkins Ridge and Griff Hunt Reserves. You'll know this is too good to miss!
Donna Walpole : 0421 997 827

Description:
THE TRADITIONAL STYLE ENTERTAINER
A beautiful family home with plenty on offer aside from what stands on the streetscape.
Behind this alluring, full of charm, easy on the eye weatherboard, lies a land of opportunity to subdivide the extensive block and reap the rewards! Positioned on approximately 1486m2, keep the existing home and build up to 3 units in the backyard STCA.
There's ample side access, relatively clear pathways and a desirable location working its magic in the one package here. Just up the road is the Croydon North shops, Chirnside Park is minutes away, so too is Croydon Main street or Mooroolbark where train lines service both suburbs.
Behind the warming exterior which is complete with a verandah, you'll discover many elements that give this home its deserved charm, including high ceilings, feature ceiling roses and cornice, timber floors, three spacious bedrooms and traditional style bathrooms that have both been renovated; the main with a claw foot bath and the en suite with a spa bath.
Live and relax comfortably with a formal lounge room at the front and a long island bench and renovated kitchen that connects the meals zone to the family room and then out to the outdoor entertaining deck.
A wood fire, split cooler, ducted heating and a double garage are just a few extras to be expected behind the picket fence of this beautiful property.
NOTE: any works are Subject To Council Approval (STCA)

Description:
LEAFY HILL LIFESTYLE
On the high side of a leafy avenue in the sought-after Birts Hill precinct is a much-loved family home, upon 1080 sq m approx. Enveloped by established gardens, this elevated Western Red Cedar home has a welcoming ambience filled with character charm.
The living room features timber floors and an open fireplace, adjoining a versatile dining room. The fully-renovated kitchen has stainless steel appliances, Jarrah benchtops and a meals area, with French doors flowing out to an alfresco entertaining area and the lush backyard. 3 bedrooms and a study share adjoining bathrooms and further highlights include: ducted heating, carport and updated laundry.
Walk to a bus, kindergarten or any of the wonderful nearby reserves. Close to prestigious private schools including Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar, nearby shopping options include Croydon North Plaza, McAdam Square and Chirnside Park Shopping Centre, with easy access to Croydon, Ringwood and EastLink.
Richard White - Mt Evelyn Office : 0419 574 153

Description:
"Beautifully Renovated Family Inspiration"
Your family can enjoy a sensational lifestyle in this beautifully renovated family sanctuary, bordering Wonga Park. From the low-maintenance cottage-style landscaped gardens to the 3 living areas over 3 levels, it will wow you. Set in an elite no-through road near Hochkins Ridge Reserve, you'll love the bay window, sweeping verandah and colonial-style windows. You won't need to lift a finger because it's been freshly painted, has new ducted heating, new entrance (porcelain tiles) and new quality carpets. Discover 4 double bedrooms (robed) and a spa bath family bathroom. Upstairs is a private parent's suite, featuring retreat/open study, WIR and luxury ensuite. Three living areas and a Hardwood Timber kitchen with quality appliances give you space and practicality. Enjoy the mountain views beside the Jetmaster gas log fireplace in the formal lounge. Delight in a formal dining, a family room and a big dining/meals area. Covered entertaining, a lush lawn and cottage-style landscaped gardens inspire outdoor living. Appointments: ducted heating/vacuum, evaporative cooling, remote double garage (workshop/storage), watering system and under-stair storage/cellar. Close to transport, shops, Yarra Rd Primary, Luther College and EastLink. SOLD by Sharyn de Vries of Ray White Croydon 0401031802

Description:
Expressions of Interest by Friday 20 December at 5pm (Unless Sold Prior)
You'll have the World at your Feet
You will literally have the world, or at least Croydon North, at your feet as you stand at the window of the magnificent formal living room of this impressive Victorian inspired 2 storey 4 bedroom home. Set in a wonderful position at the no-through end of a quiet crescent, this is a home that will leave you wanting for nothing in the way of family accommodation and lifestyle excellence.
On 2 fabulous levels this impressive home provides living areas of formal living and dining room with OFP, family/meals, expansive rumpus room opening to an enviable wine cellar and a useful storeroom and one of the most exemplary outdoor alfresco entertaining rooms you could hope to see. The timber kitchen presents a capacious walk-in pantry and ample cupboard and preparation space.
The 4 bedrooms (one currently in use as a study) are light and bright, including the main bedroom with WIR, stylish new contemporary ensuite with walk-in shower and a balcony from which to appreciate the sweeping panoramic mountain and treetop vista. 2 further bathrooms can adequately service a growing family.
Further features include a massive 3 car garage/workshop, off-street parking space, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling and immaculately landscaped gardens.
Minutes away from Croydon Hills Primary, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar and Rudolf Steiner School. Also Chirnside Park Shopping Centre, Croydon Station, Eastland and Eastlink.
* Exemplary 4 bedroom Victorian inspired home
* Elevated position with mountain and treetop views
* Spacious living/dining, family/meals and rumpus room
* Outstanding alfresco entertaining space.
* Well equipped timber kitchen and 3 bathrooms
* Enviable wine cellar, store room and 3 car garage
Terms: 10% deposit, balance 60 days
Land: 752 sq m approx.

Description:
Stylish modern living in tranquil surrounds
Expressions of Interest by Thursday 5 December at 5pm (Unless Sold Prior)
In a superb location, set upon 997 sq m approx., this 3 bedroom home will appeal to young families, downsizers and those who love entertaining! The immaculate house welcomes you via a large front deck into a north-facing carpeted lounge room with decorative cornices and a split system, flowing into the kitchen/dining area with polished floors. The timber kitchen boasts a gas cooktop, oven and dishwasher, with access to the brilliant outdoor entertaining area covered by a pitched roof pergola and equipped with lighting, ceiling fan and TV point. Day or night, this exceptional space is very private thanks to established trees and garden. The 3 carpeted bedrooms have built-in wardrobes, sharing a well-appointed family bathroom and separate toilet. Further highlights: gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, new awnings, water tank with pump, garden shed, a double garage and an adjacent carport that may suit a trailer, caravan or boat. Walk to Croydon North shopping centre, local kindergarten and buses, a short drive from schools, Eastland and EastLink, and only 20 minutes to the gateway of the Yarra Valley restaurants and wineries.
* Brilliant alfresco pavillion
* Central heating and cooling
* Quiet court location
* Nearby reserves
* Extra trailer/caravan parking
Terms: 10% deposit, balance 60/90 days
Land: 997 sq m approx.

UNDER CONTRACT
Families, Renovators and Investors, here's a 4 bedroom family home that offers you the three key ingredients - space, versatility and convenience. Yes, it's in need of some TLC, but it's easy to live in or rent out, and gives you fantastic potential to roll up your sleeves, update and capitalise. Set behind a pretty landscaped garden, you'll discover a family-friendly layout featuring 4 bedrooms (BIRs) and 2 bathrooms. The master has an ensuite, while the family bathroom is renovated. You also have the option of a huge 5th bedroom, 3rd living area or office with own access perfect as a rumpus or to run your home business. Two large living zones and a fully-equipped kitchen fitted with s/s appliances ensure practicality for living and entertaining. Relax beside the gas log fireplace in the lounge/dining room, or bring the family together in the bright family/meals room. Outdoors you'll find an in-ground pool and spa for hours of fun and a paved barbeque area for gatherings. Plus a private child-friendly garden, secure off street parking for caravan/cars, double garage, garden shed and gas heating. A premium location; walk to transport, shops, Hochkins Ridge Reserve and Village School Primary. Close to Oxley College and Chirnside shops. Be quick!

Description:
When Quality, Privacy & Location Count
If quality, location and privacy matter, this gorgeous young residence is the one for you. This stunning elevated home is just 7 years young and is hidden at the rear of a boutique block of only 3. It offers effortless living for First Homebuyers, Young Families, Downsizers or Investors. Wow-factor treed views, birdsong and beautiful landscaped gardens create instant tranquillity. The stylish, sun-kissed interior is dressed with modern window furnishings and contemporary carpets. Three bedrooms (BIRs) are zoned privately, along with a deluxe spa bath bathroom and separate toilet. You'll love the private over-sized master; it boasts a sleek ensuite, WIR and space for a desk or sofa. Delight in easy entertaining with a gourmet kitchen equipped with s/s appliances, including new dishwasher. The generous open plan design flows from a large family/meals room through to a chic lounge room. A BBQ area and picturesque, easy-care landscaped garden with sandpit makes it perfect. Appointments: ducted heating, split system air-conditioning, excellent storage, extensive under-house storage and/or man cave and remote double garage. Walk to Village School Primary, Hochkins Ridge Reserve and bus. Close to Oxley College, shops and EastLink. Act now!

Address: 42A Bonnie View Road CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136
Description:
PRIVATELY EXCLUSIVE LAND READY TO BE BUILT ON
Lined with beautifully established Oak trees, the wide driveway that leads to this 1462m2 (approx.) sized block is an impressive welcome.
Secured and almost ready to be built on, the land that is available here is prime quality for those wanting to build a group of three to four (STCA) units or townhouses within an environment that will embrace privacy and the lovely streetscape thats nearby to many facilities, including bus stops, schools, a short commute to shops and to the Croydon train station.
Depending on positioning on the block, there are potential views over to Christmas Hills to be had from the some or all of the homes.
This is a block that is like no other in the area, it has a secluded, exclusive allure, and promotes an environment that is absolutely ideal to live in.

Description:
LUXURIOUS FAMILY STYLE
Impeccably presented, this house is a must for any family who enjoy the element of sophisticated style to surround their every day, with plenty of entertaining and homely values to compliment.
Elevated and position in a court which is close to quality schools, shops and bus services, the introduction into this four bedroom beauty is perfect, set with a formal lounge room with an open fire place, and high ceilings in the first half of the home to set a tone of grand scale.
The master bedroom has the luxury of a beautiful en suite, staged with floor to ceiling tiles and quality fittings, whilst the remaining bedrooms are accompanied by yet another luxuriously presented bathroom, complete with a huge shower and dual basins that sit on a Caesar stone counter top.
The use of Caesar stone is carried through to the hostess kitchen which comfortably connects with the family room and then to the covered outdoor entertaining area, purpose built to be the highlight of any occasion, with the feature timber bar being a focal point.
Just some of the added highlights include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, private courtyard setting, single garage, single carport and external window blinds.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
When you step back in time to the elegant Federation era you'll discover this magnificent residence that has been professionally renovated to retain character and charm while creating modern spaces perfect for entertaining. Positioned on a corner block in the service road, this stunning weatherboard home offers light filled living spaces throughout that flow seamlessly from the central kitchen/dining to the rear covered alfresco area overlooking the in-ground pool and manicured gardens. A formal fire-side lounge is situated at the front of the home along with the master bedroom and ensuite, separate from the remaining bedrooms and large family room. Flexible in design the floor plan allows you to tailor this property to suit your family's needs, with 4 generous bedrooms plus study/5th bedroom. With plenty of storage, this property boasts a double carport (enter off Bonnie View Road) with remote roller doors, a workshop plus secure, covered off street parking for trailer/boat. Securely fenced, this private residence is the perfect place to raise your family. Set on a large allotment of 914m2 approx. in leafy Croydon North with easy access to public transport, Eastlink, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar, this property is almost too good for words!
Other appointments include; pressed metal features, open fire place, new paint & carpet throughout, 9ft ceilings, spa bath, gas ducted heating, ceiling fans, polished floor boards & solar heated pool.

Description:
Pure Comfort, Period Charm
An attractive period facade, multiple living zones and a clever interior design make this impeccably stylish home an ideal option for growing families. Upon entry, the home reveals a stunning formal lounge/dining room filled with light from the bay window and a spacious kitchen with marble bench tops and adjoining meals area overlooking the central family room. Featuring 4 generous bedrooms, the master is equipped with a walk-in robe and ensuite while the 4th bed is tucked away downstairs with access to the rumpus, study and the laundry. Utilising every last bit of space, under the house is fitted with workshop facilities and has ample room for extra storage or a home gym if desired. An undercover timber deck with integrated lighting completes the home and is accessed from the family room, has elevated views and overlooks the rear yard which showcases manicured gardens and an 8-seater spa.
Also features:
*New solid timber floors upstairs; New SS appls
*Foxtel points; Dedicated fax & phone lines; BIRs
*GDH & EVAP AC; Remote double lock up garage
*Watering system throughout garden & lawn
*Near to Hochkins Ridge Reserve, transport & shops
*Close to Yarra Valley Grammar & Luther College

Description:
Family Brilliance in a Prized Address
From the idyllic address near quality schools to the spacious layout and delightful landscaped gardens, this beautifully appointed sanctuary will tick all the boxes for your family. Colourful landscaped gardens, a bay window and verandah create a brilliant first impression. The fresh interior feels good too with its modern dcor and splashes of natural light. Four double bedrooms (robed, ceiling fans) are complemented by a family bathroom. The private master boasts WIR and ensuite, and has space for a sofa or desk. You'll enjoy the practicality of two large living areas a split-level lounge/dining room and a casual family/meals room. The fully-equipped modern kitchen has bay window and dishwasher. Entertain friends or soak up the treed outlook on the long covered deck. Children have privacy and space in the picturesque landscaped garden. Quality appointments: insulated electric roller shutters, ducted heating, ducted vacuum, air-conditioning, off street parking (3 cars), under-house storage and remote double garage (rear access, space for a workshop). Walk to Croydon Hills Primary, milk bar, bus and reserves. Close to Luther College, Good Shepherd Lutheran Primary, Yarra Valley Grammar and McAdam Square shops. Act now.

Description:
QUALITY BUILT BRAND NEW
Quality built and brand new this luxurious unit offers low maintenance living in a relaxed setting. Surrounded by Hochkins Ridge and Griff Hunt Reserves, the lifestyle is one of leisure. Beautifully crafted, the home features 3 bedrooms including the master with walk-in robe and ensuite, stunning kitchen with stainless steel appliances and stone benches and open plan lounge and dining zones. Bonuses include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings and remote double garages. With shops and bus transport close by, it’s simply perfect for first home buyers, investors and empty nesters.
Inspection times and property availability are subject to change without notice. Photo identification required at all open for inspections.

Address: 69 Bonnie View Road CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136
Description:
Flexible Family Living - 868m2
First Homebuyers, Young Families and Tradies must see this spacious home set on 868m2 (approx.). The spacious 4 bedroom interior has a warm, 'rustic' feel. It's easy to live in now, and there's the opportunity to further modernise over time if you wish. The family sized floor plan includes an intimate formal lounge, 4 good sized bedrooms (3 with BIR's), plus 2 crisp new bathrooms. Discover a well appointed kitchen featuring s/s appliances plus dishwasher. The huge open plan family zone with sliding glass door leads out to a covered decking that's ideal for all seasons entertaining. This overlooks the classic back garden that's ideal for children to play and even includes a cubby, tree swing and room for a trampoline. What's more there's also a powered workshop/studio, garden shed and a triple carport. Extras include: Hydronic heating, Air conditioning, ceiling fans, water tank and a location that has quality schools, shop, transport and parkland all close by.
Naiomi Bentley : 0404 036 044

Address: Unit 5/15-17 Bonnie View Road CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136
Description:
STYLISH LIVING IN THE PERFECT LOCALE!
Here's your chance to secure this superb three bedroom single level federation style home in this quality development with all the luxuries and comforts you will ever need. Positioned close to all amenities including shops and transport, yet encompassed by lush green landscaped gardens and tranquil surroundings.
Tastefully presented in neutral tones, this residence offers flowing open plan design with quality carpets, tiling, fixtures & fittings throughout, generous sized living & dining area which leads out to private rear courtyard as well as secure double lock-up garage.
Featuring a modern kitchen with European appliances, ample cupboard and bench space, as well as the three generous bedrooms - master with ensuite, which are fitted with spacious built-in-robes and are serviced by a large central bathroom. As an extra the home also includes split system air conditioning.
Move straight in and find peace of mind while enjoying a low maintenance lifestyle. The estate backs on to Warrien Reserve so you can take advantage of its serene landscapes and walking tracks, and driving into the city will be a breeze with Eastlink just moments away.
